ComicInfo.Summary:
In part 2 of 2, Dejah Thoris and her renegade brother, the twisted Kajak Thoris, circle toward their final confrontation. The lives of her entire family hang in the balance as events from the past collide with the present to dictate the future of Helium's royal family!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------- 1:2 | Regular Cover, 50/50 split | Jay Anacleto | 1 | 1:2 | Regular Cover, 50/50 split | Fabiano Neves | 2 | RI | Risque Cover | Mel Rubi | Missing |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-10 11:48:27. [CVDB442940]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Fabiano Neves, Jay Anacleto, Mel Rubi
ComicInfo.Editor: Hannah Gorfinkel Elder, Joseph Rybandt, Molly Mahan
ComicInfo.Characters: Dejah Thoris, Em-Nar, Kajak Thoris, Landis
